alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 6:46AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT NORTHERN WALLACE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS...CHEYENNE...SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS AND SOUTHERN DUNDY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA... At 545 AM MST/645 AM CST/, a snow squall was located along a line extending from near Haigler to 3 miles west of Ruleton to 10 miles south of Kanorado. Movement was east at 15 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with this squall. Locations impacted include... Goodland, St. Francis, Benkelman, Kanorado, Ruleton, Bird City, and Haigler. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 35. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this squall. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location.
